about_the_game:
Meet the legendary hit on your computers, with over 100 million active players worldwide! Ready for a mind-blowingly fun racing game where you can't predict what's around the next corner? Choose your car, step on the gas, dodge endless obstacles and avoid crazy rivals in exciting races that always offer something new and unexpected!

Feeling the thirst for speed?

Action and drive, stunning cars and much more in Race Master game with intuitive controls and crazy twists and turns.

Stay in the lane!

33 unique levels with a variety of surfaces and obstacles for a dizzying race. Plus 8 different bosses in unique cars to make each race even more exciting.

Race around the world

7 unique locations with different track features and detailed backgrounds. Ramps, tunnels and 14 different neon effects.

What's in your garage?

Collect and customize 7 classic sports cars as you progress through the game's levels. Finish in high positions, earn more money, tune the engine for maximum acceleration and handling, add accessories and choose any of 15 different colors for your car.

Can you hear the roar of the engine?

Who needs music when there's the roar of engines, the squeal of tires and the rumble of collisions? Enjoy realistic soundtrack, spectacular graphics and spectacular collisions that will make you feel every skid and braking.

Looking for a racing game full of drive, unique cars and dangerous rivals? Race Master 3D will offer all this in fast and furious races that you can join anytime!

name: Race Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+, Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 270, GeForce GTX 670 (Kepler architecture, driver 472.12+), Intel Iris Xe, or similar (with 2+ GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+, Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: adeon RX 580, GeForce GTX 1060, Intel Arc A380, or similar (with 4+ GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Looking for a game that’s easy to pick up but offers real driving challenges, along with endless thrills, unique cars, and fierce rivals? Race Master 3D has it all, with fast-paced, intense races that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere.
